definitions.definition: To murder for the same purpose as Burke, to kill in order to have a body to sell to anatomists , surgeons , etc.
definitions.label_groups: UK , Ireland , Australia , New Zealand , slang , historical

definitions.definition: To smother ; to conceal, hush up, suppress .

main_definition: ( UK , Ireland , Australia , New Zealand , slang ) To murder by suffocation .
secondary_definitions: ( UK , Ireland , Australia , New Zealand , slang , historical ) To murder for the same purpose as Burke, to kill in order to have a body to sell to anatomists , surgeons , etc.
( UK , Ireland , Australia , New Zealand , slang ) To smother ; to conceal, hush up, suppress .
